title: I want this in my next Treo
author: VD
content_html: A lot of people are into plasma and LCD screens. I’m not, I prefer projectors because I like monster screens that fill the entire wall. And while I’ve anticipated mobile phone-computers with projectors inside, I had no idea that the hardware technologies are as close as they appear to be already.
content_text:
A lot of people are into plasma and LCD screens.  I’m not, I prefer projectors because I like monster screens that fill the entire wall.  And while I’ve anticipated mobile phone-computers with projectors inside, I had no idea that the hardware technologies
are as close as they appear to be already
.
